PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-06542020-09-20,  ,  SNRS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to provide a longer period for Canada Pension Plan (CPP) beneficiaries to ascertain if they want to cancel receipt of CPP benefits and to repay benefits already received.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0206 Publication Date: 2020-09-30
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
precis: Regulations amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to provide a longer period for Canada Pension Plan (CPP) beneficiaries to ascertain if they want to cancel receipt of CPP benefits and to repay benefits already received.
